primary.heading: Focus Mode for Todoist
primary.subtitle: Flowist help you focus on what matters. Rather than being overwhelmed by a big list of tasks, gain clarity from working on one task at a time. Free and open-source.

quote.text: “This way of work … where we have a lot of very varied things that have to be done, all mixed together all at once, really is incompatible with our brain.”
quote.author: — Cal Newport
